topics.body:
I really hate Ichigo Kurosaki from Bleach as a character.

He's too noble and righteous that he's uninteresting. Also, his flaw is his stubbornness and the fact that he always tries to justify himself as the right one. And when he's lied to and just wrong, he goes into a depression and is just as angst as Sasuke but with less the revenge counter.

He's basically a kid with a high IQ but emotional problems and justifying-himself complex, whatever that's called (I forgot).
